mapper.insert: insert into tbl_ParaConfig ( para_Name, para_Type, para_Createdate, para_Updatedate )values ( #{paraName}, #{paraType}, #{paraCreatedate}, #{paraUpdatedate} )
mapper.update: update tbl_ParaConfig set para_Name=#{paraName}, para_Type=#{paraType}, para_Createdate=#{paraCreatedate}, para_Updatedate=#{paraUpdatedate} where pk_paraConfig=#{pkParaconfig}
mapper.select: select pk_paraConfig, para_Name, para_Type, para_Createdate, para_Updatedate from tbl_ParaConfig where pk_paraConfig=#{pkParaconfig}
select pk_paraConfig, para_Name, para_Type, para_Createdate, para_Updatedate from tbl_ParaConfig where pk_paraConfig=#{pkParaconfig}
